name: Ocean Fish Evolution
description:
In the mysterious depths of the ocean, there are hidden murders everywhere.And this time you will play the role of an inconspicuous little fish to experience the cruel laws of nature's survival.In order to survive, you need to keep eating fish smaller than you and make yourself grow up quickly.When there are dense schools of fish, you have to show great evasion skills to avoid dangerous big fish.In the meantime, even if you evolve into a shark, you can't treat it lightly.Only by evolving into the most advanced whale can you dominate this ocean.

PLAYING METHODS
-Control your little fish to swim freely on the bottom of the sea, up stream or diving.
-Wonderful adventures at the bottom of the sea, eating fish smaller than you and growing up.
-Bombs、healing items and other game props will appear randomly, making your survival war more intense and exciting.
